Content: Meta is a platinum sponsor of the 10th edition of the International Conference on Learning Representations (@iclr_conf) from April 25-29th.

Together w/the #Ego4D consortium, we developed 5 benchmarks centered on first-person visual experience to spur advancements toward more useful AI assistants.

They are: episodic memory, forecasting, hand-object manipulation, audio-visual diarization & social interaction.

Thanks for your patience while things get back to normal.

Hello! We had an issue earlier with comments being flagged by an over-enthusiastic piece of moderation code. It's been corrected so it moderates more... moderately, and we're looking at what else needs fixed.

Thanks for all your reports - it helped us discover what was wrong.
Please don't send us any Bitcoin. We honestly would not know what to do with it. Instead send your favorite #FacebookGaming creators some Stars.

Hey Twitter! We‚Äôve spent time listening to and chatting with @WatchMixer streamers over the last few days - and we hear you guys. In no particular order, here are the top questions we‚Äôve heard from various Town Halls, Discord chats & DMs‚Ä¶ with some answers!

Join the #NeurIPS2019 workshop on Responsible & Reproducible AI on tomorrow at 2pm PT Room West 118 - 120. We‚Äôll cover tools and tips for creating reproducible work and how to move Private AI forward.
